Q: Prank to automate Win11 system sound change A:

My best advice would be to disable handling of insertion of an USB device forever. The default behavior when it is handled is even dangerous.

Q: Query that references enum in joined Rails table A:

You can split . notation into a nested hash:

Item.joins(:tags).where(tags: {value: :hot})

Create a scope to simplify usage:

class Item < ApplicationRecord
  has_many :tags

  scope :tagged, ->(value) { joins(:tags).where(tags: {value:}) }
end

Item.tagged(:hot)
